org.graphity.server.model

Class QueriedResourceBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.graphity.server.model.LinkedDataResourceBase
      • org.graphity.server.model.QueriedResourceBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.hp.hpl.jena.graph.FrontsNode, com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.RDFNode, com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource, LinkedDataResource, QueriedResource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LDPResourceBase

    public class QueriedResourceBase
extends LinkedDataResourceBase
implements QueriedResource
    Base class of generic read-only Linked Data resources with RDF representations queried from SPARQL endpoints.
    Author:
    Martynas Juseviƒçius
    See Also:
    SPARQLEndpoint, ARQ Query

                   com.sun.jersey.api.core.ResourceConfig resourceConfig,
                   @Context
                   com.sun.jersey.api.core.ResourceContext resourceContext)
        JAX-RS-compatible resource constructor with injected initialization objects. The URI of the resource being created is the absolute path of the current request URI.
        Parameters:
        uriInfo - URI information of the request
        resourceConfig - webapp configuration
        resourceContext - resource context
        See Also:
        JAX-RS UriInfo, Jersey ResourceConfig, Jersey ResourceContext

      • QueriedResourceBase

                   SPARQLEndpoint endpoint,
                   com.sun.jersey.api.core.ResourceConfig resourceConfig)
        Protected constructor. Not suitable for JAX-RS but can be used when subclassing.
        Parameters:
        resource - This resource as RDF resource (must be URI resource, not a blank node)
        endpoint - SPARQL endpoint of this resource
        resourceConfig - Resource config

    • Method Detail

      • describe

        public com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model describe()
        Returns RDF description of this resource. The description is the result of a query executed on the SPARQL endpoint of this resource. By default, the query is DESCRIBE with URI of this resource.
        Returns:
        RDF description
        See Also:
        getQuery()
